fields.headline: Nationwide League Fixtures
fields.bodyText: FIXTURES (3pm unless stated) FIRST DIVISION Brighton v Wimbledon Crystal Palace v Coventry Grimsby v Bradford Ipswich v Millwall Nottm Forest v Walsall Reading v Leicester Rotherham v Sheff Wed (12noon) Sheff Utd v Burnley Stoke v Preston Watford v Portsmouth Wolverhampton v Derby Postponed: Gillingham v Norwich SECOND DIVISION Barnsley v Northampton Blackpool v Huddersfield (1pm) Brentford v Colchester Cardiff v Swindon Chesterfield v Luton Crewe v Mansfield Peterborough v QPR Plymouth v Cheltenham Stockport v Port Vale Tranmere v Oldham Wigan v Notts County Wycombe v Bristol City. THIRD DIVISION Bournemouth v Swansea Bristol Rovers v Torquay (1pm) Bury v Hull Darlington v Rochdale Exeter v Kidderminster Hartlepool v Carlisle (1pm) Leyton Orient v Cambridge Utd Lincoln City v Boston Utd Rushden & D'monds v Shrewsbury Southend v Oxford Utd Wrexham v Macclesfield York v Scunthorpe BELL'S SCOTTISH LEAGUE FIRST DIVISION Alloa v Falkirk; Arbroath v St Johnstone; Clyde v St Mirren; Inverness CT v Ross County; Queen of South v Ayr SECOND DIVISION Brechin v Forfar; Cowdenbeath v Raith; Dumbarton v Airdrie Utd; Hamilton v Berwick; Stenhousemuir v Stranraer THIRD DIVISION East Fife v Montrose; Stirling v East Stirling.
